title: Keir Starmer – 2022 Comments on the Health of Queen Elizabeth II
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 8 September 2022.
content:
Along with the rest of the country, I am deeply worried by the news from Buckingham Palace this afternoon.
